revised_title: Electro-Magnetic Properties of Metalliferous Veins in Cornish Mines
tldr: The author investigates the electro-magnetic properties of metalliferous veins in the mines of Cornwall and discovers that the intensity of electro-magnetic action is related to the abundance of copper ore in the veins. The study suggests that electro-magnetism may be useful in determining the quantity of ore in veins and their directions.
